name: theon
description: A library to build domain-specific, extensible and expressive API clients
author: Tomas Aparicio

scripts.uglify: ./node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs theon.js --mangle --preamble "/*! theon v${VERSION} - MIT license - https://github.com/h2non/theon */" --source-map theon.min.js.map --source-map-url http://cdn.rawgit.com/h2non/theon.js/${VERSION}/theon.min.js.map > theon.min.js
scripts.browser: npm run browserify && npm run uglify
scripts.stats: npm run loc && npm run size && npm run gzip
